sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnonlinemanual ( ONLINE_MNL_ID /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DFN /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_NM /* */ ) VALUES ( #onlineMnlId# /* */ , #onlineMnlSeCode# /* */ , #onlineMnlDfn# /* */ , #onlineMnlDc# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #onlineMnlNm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnonlinemanual SET ONLINE_MNL_ID=#onlineMnlId# /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE=#onlineMnlSeCode# /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DFN=#onlineMnlDfn# /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DC=#onlineMnlDc# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_NM=#onlineMnlNm# /* */ WHERE ONLINE_MNL_ID=#onlineMnlId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ONLINE_MNL_ID /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DFN /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_NM /* */ FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE ONLINE_MNL_ID=#onlineMnlId# /* */

SELECT ONLINE_MNL_ID /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DFN /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_DC /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , ONLINE_MNL_NM /* */ FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE 1=1
ONLINE_MNL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ONLINE_MNL_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnonlinemanual WHERE 1=1
ONLINE_MNL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ONLINE_MNL_SE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
